item.title: About
item.description: I am a Software engineer at Neural Concept, a start up based out of the Computer Vision Lab at EPFL. Our company works on building 3D Deep Learning models that learn to predict values of physical simulations based on the input shape geometries. I am working on building a scalable framework to train and interact with the deep learning models. I have over 6 years of experience in software development and data science.
